---
title: "`r site_df$NAME_OF_SITE`"
output: html_document
---

The `r glue("{site_df$NAME_OF_SITE} ({site_df$SITE_CODE})")` site includes `r length(series_names(site_df$FHX[[1]]))` trees. 

It includes the following species:

```{r species, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
spp = as.vector(unlist(strsplit(site_df$SPECIES_CODE, split = ", ")))
cat(paste('-', spp), sep='\n')
```

It is being contributed by:

```{r contrib, echo=FALSE, results="asis"}
contribs = as.vector(unlist(strsplit(site_df$CONTRIBUTORS, split = "; ")))
cat(paste('-', contribs), sep='\n')
```


A check of the FHX file formatting and data entry has been performed, resulting in the following message(s):

```{r check-series, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
check_series(site_df$FHX[[1]])
```


Here is a graph of the site data
```{r plot, echo = FALSE, fig.align='center'}
plot_demograph(site_df$FHX[[1]], plot_legend = TRUE)
```
